content:
Jake Corman

Recently released NCAA documents may not be enough for state Sen PERIOD Jake Corman and state treasurer Rob McCord PERIOD

On Friday the two asked a judge to review more than  additional documents related to the imposition of the  consent decree in which the NCAA imposed sanctions on Penn State and its football program PERIOD

They brought the suit against the NCAA regarding where the money from Penn States  million will go PERIOD

Now Corman and McCord want an  review of the  documents by a commonwealth court judge according to court documents PERIOD

 the document reads PERIOD 

Corman and McCord also questioned previous NCAA redactions PERIOD

The sanctions imposed in consent decree were a response to the universitys handling of the child sex abuse case involving former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky who is currently serving a 30to60 year prison sentence on  counts of child sex abuse PERIOD
